body.p: This resource is protected by a security constraint. Please login with a valid user and password. If you have installed the source distribution, the default settings are "admin" for both, user and password. Otherwise you have to define a role called "dba" in your webserver setup and assign a user to it.
Please note that the resource is protected by the webserver, not by eXist (the database will not yet be available during startup, so database authentication doesn't work).
